content.question: Which of the following groups in late-nineteenth-century Egypt would have been most likely to support the author’s view in the third paragraph about the status of women in “modern civilization” ?

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
